name: prepare log entry
check
prepare log entry
save input to LDM
prepare login request
save login response to LDM
func:
/* recreate message from input */
var response = {};
response.req = msg.req;
response.res = msg.res;
response.ldm = msg.ldm;

/* set values for tracing */
var trace = {
    "step": "save login response to LDM",
    "timestamp": new Date().getTime()
};
response.ldm.process.trace.push(trace);

/* get all cookies from the login response */
var cookies = msg.headers['set-cookie'];
var sessionCookie = '';

for (var k in cookies) {
    sessionCookie += cookies[k].substring(0, cookies[k].indexOf(';') + 1);
}

response.ldm.header.sessionCookie =
    sessionCookie.substring(0, sessionCookie.lastIndexOf(';'));
/* get all cookies from login response - end */

/* store property values of the login response */
response.ldm.header.remindersurl = msg.payload.webservices.reminders.url;
response.ldm.header.languageCode = msg.payload.dsInfo.languageCode;
response.ldm.header.dsid = msg.payload.dsInfo.dsid;

/* list of country codes, GMT offsets and time zone names */
var codes = {
    "AD_GMT+1" : "Europe/Andorra",

/* determines the time zone name for a given country code and GMT offset */
function timezonename(countryCode, gmt) {
    /* return as default */
    var timeZone = 'Europe/London';
    
    var key = countryCode + '_' + gmt;

    /* override with exact time zone */
    if (key in codes) {
        timeZone = codes[key];
    }
    
    return timeZone;
}

response.ldm.header.usertz = timezonename(msg.payload.requestInfo.country,
                                          msg.payload.requestInfo.timeZone);

return response;

name: prepare startup request
save response to LDM
prepare logout request
logout
info: triggers the logout in the given interval

name: set exception
clear login cache
